EFORL-R.BK.short_name: E FOR L AIM PUBLIC COMPANY LIMI
EFORL-R.BK.long_name: E for L Aim Public Company Limited
EFORL-R.BK.summary: E for L Aim Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes medical devices and equipment to government and private sectors in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Distributor of Medical Devices and Equipment, and Beauty Treatments. The company also offers healthiness and beauty products, such as cosmetic, healthy drinks, and supplementary food products, as well as snail slime products; educational, and clinical and laboratory microscopes, as well as microscopes for biological scientific researches; and medical laboratory services. In addition, it offers franchising services; and operates a training center. The company was formerly known as Absolute Impact Public Company Limited and changed its name to E for L Aim Public Company Limited in September 2013. E for L Aim Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TM-R.BK.summary: Techno Medical Public Company Limited trades in medical supplies, tools, and equipment in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Disposable Equipment and Supplies, and Medical Equipment and Instrument segments. Techno Medical Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
